name: JustStorage
description: Content-addressable object storage service with strong consistency guarantees

GC_BATCH_SIZE.description: Number of blobs to process per GC cycle

HOT_STORAGE_ROOT.description: Path for hot storage (ephemeral on Heroku)

COLD_STORAGE_ROOT.description: Path for cold storage (ephemeral on Heroku)

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token validation (REQUIRED for production)

API_KEYS.description: Comma-separated list of API keys (REQUIRED for production)

DISABLE_AUTH.description: Disable authentication (development only, DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION)

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'JustStorage deployed successfully! Visit /health to verify.'
